name: Airbnb Room Price Prediction
description: Analyzed and predicted Airbnb room prices based on various features for hosts. The process involved problem reframing based on business understanding, exploratory data analysis, data preprocessing, machine learning modeling, and evaluation. We also deployed the model and developed a web application to visualize the data and provide hosts with the system.

name: Loan Repayment Success Prediction
description: Predicted loan repayment success, ensuring creditworthy customers are not turned down while maintaining a structure that encourages successful repayments. The process involved exploratory data analysis to gain actionable insights for stakeholders, data preprocessing, feature selection for machine learning, and model training and hyperparameter tuning for predicting loan repayment success.
course: Rakamin Academy x Home Credit Indonesia

name: Montesse Steak House Website UI Design
description: Designed a responsive website for Montesse Steak House. Collaborated with a mentor to create wireframes and high-fidelity prototypes to visualize and refine the design, and conducted usability testing to address user pain points.

name: Dicoding Website UI Enhancement
description: Enhanced the user interface of the Dicoding website to improve usability, accessibility, and overall user experience. Collaborated with peers and mentors to create wireframes and high-fidelity prototypes to visualize and refine the design, and conducted usability testing to address user pain points.
course: SISTECH UI/UX Design RISTEK University of Indonesia
